overview: Mike is the Co-Founder and Co-Inventor of ACT!â„¢, released in 1987, which created the Contact Management category and is attributed to being the catalyst for the CRM industry. Mike began his career with IBM as a Marketing Representative. It was there that he discovered the value of developing more effective relationships. His entire career has been devoted to cultivating the highest quality relationships. His inherent understanding of the value of sustainable relationships, a love for technology and a frustration with the industry offerings inspired him to co-found VIPorbit Software International, Inc.
